mapper.select: SELECT a.board_no ,a.board_title ,a.mem_id ,b.mem_nm ,a.board_content ,board_date FROM boards a, members b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards( board_no, board_title, mem_id, board_content) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(board_no),0)+1 FROM boards), #{boardTitle}, #{memId}, #{boardContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.board_no ,a.board_title ,a.board_content ,a.mem_id ,b.mem_nm ,board_date FROM boards a, members b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.board_no = #{boardNo} AND del_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replys (reply_no, board_no, mem_id, reply_content) VALUES(#{replyNo}, #{boardNo}, #{memId}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: select a.reply_no ,a.mem_id ,b.mem_nm ,a.reply_content ,TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI') as reply_date from replys a, members b WHERE a.mem_id= b.mem_id AND a.reply_no = #{replyNo} AND a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY 1

select a.reply_no ,a.mem_id ,b.mem_nm ,a.reply_content ,TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI') as reply_date from replys a, members b WHERE a.mem_id= b.mem_id AND a.board_no = #{boardNo} AND a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY reply_no DESC
mapper.update: update ( select * from replys a, members b WHERE a.mem_id= b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY reply_date DESC ) SET del_yn = 'Y' WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND reply_no = #{replyNo}
